alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 14 at 11:54PM CDT until March 15 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BEAUREGARD PARISH...WEST CENTRAL NEWTON AND EAST CENTRAL JASPER COUNTIES... At 1154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Trout Creek, or 7 miles southwest of Bon Weir, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kirbyville, Call, Bon Weir, Trout Creek, Bivens, Roganville, Bancroft, Old Salem, Mt. Union and Bleakwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
